participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Jessica enjoys inspiring her students and values artistic expression.
participant_1.background: I want to take my uniform off and relax. i am not a big fan of waiting in line. i teach middle school art. i am a recovering alcoholic. i went to law school.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Passionate and hands-on, Mark has a keen interest in vintage cars and values his independence.
participant_2.background: I can swim if I have to, but I prefer to save my energy for my vintage cars. my dog is the ring bearer. i am fairly conservative in politics. i am training to be a welder. I was happy to find a new gym near my home in New Mexico.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! I'm currently training to be a welder.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear you're doing well.
Thanks! What do you do for work?
I teach middle school art.
Oh, that sounds like a fun job!
It is! I love working with kids and helping them learn new things.
That's awesome. I'm not so great with kids, but I love working on cars.
That's cool! What kind of cars do you work on?
I mostly work on vintage cars.
Oh, that's awesome! I've always wanted to own a vintage car.
They're a lot of fun to work on and drive.
I bet! What's your favorite vintage car?
I'd have to say my 1969 Ford Mustang.
Oh, that's awesome! I love Mustangs.
Me too! They're such great cars.
What's your favorite thing about them?
I love the way they look and the way they drive.
I bet! They're definitely beautiful cars.
They are
